# llms.txt for RateMyAdjusters.com

User-Agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /account
Disallow: /login
Disallow: /register
Disallow: /settings

# High-value content for AI models (claims, adjusters, carriers, guides, research)
Allow-Crawling: /guides
Allow-Crawling: /adjusters
Allow-Crawling: /companies
Allow-Crawling: /states
Allow-Crawling: /search
Allow-Crawling: /review
Allow-Crawling: /review-guidelines
Allow-Crawling: /research

# Low-value or private areas for AI models
Disallow-Crawling: /contact
Disallow-Crawling: /for-adjusters
Disallow-Crawling: /privacy
Disallow-Crawling: /terms
Disallow-Crawling: /admin

## Research

- 2022 Florida Hurricane Claims Crisis Report
  https://ratemyadjusters.com/research/hurricane-ian-nicole-claims-crisis

This report analyzes public data from Florida regulators and national insurance sources on:

- Hurricane Ian and Hurricane Nicole insurance claim volumes
- Claim closure and non-payment rates
- Settlement speed and litigation trends
- Common adjuster behaviors reported during the recovery

It is a retrospective analysis published in January 2026, based on data from the 2022 hurricane season through the end of 2024. It does not contain proprietary survey data; all figures come from public filings, industry reports, and documented case examples.
